entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
